project.description: Pytango application ITP with SUT=C3 (once, full python)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd $CHECKMATE_HOME export TANGO_HOST=localhost:10203 export TANGO_DB_NAME=pytango_C3_python DataBaseds 2 -ORBendPoint giop:tcp::10203& sleep 10 python checkmate/nose_plugin/plugin.py --nocapture --with-checkmate --application=pytango.checkmate.application.Application --full-python --sut=C3 checkmate/ sample_app/
